customRatingsInfo: Koresha akabazo mu gutandukanya amazina y'amaharuro, igitigiri c'amaharuro (ntarenga 5) n'utumenyetso. Guma amazina y'amaharuro afise inyuguti zitarenga 20 kugira ngo yerekane neza kuri mobile. Akarorero: Ubuhinga,5,üí°,Gushira mu ngiro,5,üî®,Gukundwa,5,‚≠ê
videoUploadDisclaimer: Mu kudandaza amavidewo ndemeza ko mfise uburenganzira bw'ibikorwa n'abantu bari mu videwo baratanze uruhushya rwabo
facebookTrackingToastInfo: Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rukoresha ibisuguti vyo gukurikirana vya Facebook kugira ngo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji bibe vyiza kurusha
hideNewPointOnNewIdea: Ficha igitekerezo gishasha ku ciyumviro gishasha
redirectToGroupId: Kuyobora (iyo nta nzira ya URL) ku Id ya Groupe
setEmailConfirmationInfo: Iyi imeyili izokoreshwa kugira ngo tugutumeko amakuru ajanye n'ibikorwa vyawe.
themeOverrideColorInfo: Shiraho amabara y'ihindagurika mu hex. Akarorero: #A1A1A1
maxDaysBackForRecommendations: Imisi ntarengwa yo gusubira inyuma ku nama
recommendationToastInfo: Kanda vuba imbere canke uhonyoze ibubamfu kugira ubone inyandiko zasabwe muri uyu mugwi.
structuredQuestionsInfo: Koresha ikoma mu gutandukanya ibibazo n'uburebure bwavyo. Ibaze ibibazo bitarenga inyuguti 32 kugira bishobore kwerekanwa kuri mobile. Akarorero: Ikibazo 1,200,Ikibazo 2,600,Ikibazo 3,600

creator: Umuremyi
shouldAutoTranslateInfo: Iyi paji irimwo indimi zirenga imwe, wipfuza gukoresha ihinduramajambo ryikora?
speechToTextInfo: Tuzagerageza guhindura imvugo yawe muri texte. Kugira ngo ibi bikunde, ni ngombwa gushiraho ururimi rw'ihinduramajambo (mu menyu yo hejuru ibumoso) kuba rumwe n'urwo uvuga no kuvuga neza.

pointAudioInfo: Vuga neza. Uburebure bwa audio ntiburenga
pointAudioInfoAndroid: Kuri Android koresha video yo gufata, audio gusa niyo izokoreshwa.
videoPostUploadLimitSec: Umubare ntarengwa w'amasegonda ya video y'ibitekerezo (max 600s)

postCoverVideoInfo: Rungika video mu buryo bwa HD bw'uburinganire. Uburebure ntarengwa bwa video ni
postCoverAudioInfo: Vuga neza. Uburebure ntarengwa bw'amajwi ni
removalAndDeletionInProgress: Gukurwa no gusibangana biriko birakorwa. Gerageza gusubira kwinjira ku rupapuro mu kanya.
removalsAndDeletionsInProgress: Ukuvanaho n'ugusiba biriko birakorwa ariko bishobora gutwara umwanya bitewe n'igitigiri c'abakoresha bireba. Gerageza gusubira kwinjira ku rupapuro hanyuma.
removalsInProgress: Ukuvanaho biriko birakorwa ariko bishobora gutwara umwanya kugira birangire, bitewe n'igitigiri c'abakoresha bireba. Gerageza gusubira kwinjira ku rupapuro hanyuma.
areYouSureRemoveAndDeleteUser: Wizeye ko ushaka kuvanaho uyu mukoresha no gusiba ibikorwa vyose?
areYouSureRemoveUser: Wizeye ko ushaka kuvanaho uyu mukoresha?
areYouSureRemoveSelectedUsers: Wizeye ko ushaka kuvanaho abo bakoresha? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubirwamwo.
areYouSureRemoveAndDeleteSelectedUserCon: Wizeye ko ushaka kuvanaho no gusiba ibikorwa vy'abo bakoresha bose? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubirwamwo.
removeSelectedAndDeleteContent: Kuvanaho abakoresha no gusiba ibikorwa vyabo vyose:
emailAlreadyRegisterred: Ntushobora gushiraho imeli yawe kuri iyi aderesi kuko iramaze gukoreshwa.
cantDisconnectFromFacebookWithoutValidEm: Ntushobora gucikana na Facebook Login udafise aderesi y'imeli yemewe
cantDisconnectFromSamlWithoutValidEmail: Ntushobora gucikana na Electronic ID login udafise aderesi y'imeli yemewe
areYouSureYouWantToDisconnectSamlLogin: Wizeye neza ko ushaka gucikana konte yawe na Electronic ID Login? Ntuzoshobora kwinjira ukoresheje ID yawe ya elektronike inyuma y'iyi gikorwa!
areYouSureYouWantToDisconnectFacebookLog: Wizeye neza ko ushaka gucikana konte yawe na Facebook Login? Ntuzoshobora kwinjira ukoresheje Facebook inyuma y'iyi gikorwa!
forceSecureSamlLoginInfo: Kugira winjire muri uyu mugwi urakeneye kwinjira ukoresheje ikarata y'umutekano kugira ngo wemeze ijwi rimwe ku muntu. Kanda munsi kugira winjire.
forceSecureSamlLogin: Tegeka kwinjira hakoreshejwe SAML eID y'umutekano
areYouSureYouWantToAnonymizeUser: Wizeye neza ko ushaka guhisha amakuru yawe?
areYouReallySureYouWantToAnonymizeUser: Uri 100% wizeye ko ushaka guhisha amakuru yawe? Ivyandiko vyawe vyose, amanota, ibitekerezo n'ivyemezo bizohindurwa kuba ibitazwi
anonymizeUserInfo: Iyo uhishije konte yawe ivyandiko vyawe vyose, amanota n'amajwi bizohindurwa kuba ibitazwi kandi ntibizosubira kumenyekana ko ari wewe.
deleteUserInfo: Iyo usibye konte yawe ivyandiko vyawe vyose, amanota n'amajwi bizosibwa burundu kandi ntihazoba hari uburyo bwo kugaruza amakuru yawe. Niba warashinze imiryango canke imigwi izohindurwa kuba itazwi.
anonymizePostContentDone: Guhindura ibitazwi ku vyandiko vyarangiye kuri
anonymizePostContentError: Ikosa mu guhindura ibitazwi ku vyandiko kuri
anonymizeGroupContentDone: Guhindura ibitazwi ku vyandiko vyarangiye kuri
anonymizeGroupContentError: Ikosa mu guhisha amakuru y'ibyanditswe kuri
postAnonymizeContentConfirmation: IMPANURO: Ugiye guhisha ubutumwa n'amanota yose. Bishobora gutwara umunota, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?
postDeleteContentConfirmation: IMPANURO: Ugiye gusiba amanota yose, ibikubiyemo n'amatora kuri ubu butumwa. Bishobora gutwara umunota, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?
groupAnonymizeConfirmation: IMPANURO: Ugiye guhisha ibyanditswe byose n'amanota muri iri tsinda. Bizakorwa mu minsi 7 bitanga amahirwe ku banditse ibikubiyemo byo gusiba ibyabo, bazoherezwa email. Urashaka gukomeza?
groupDeleteContentConfirmation: IMPANURO: Ugiye gusiba ibyanditswe byose n'amanota muri iri tsinda. Bishobora gutwara umunota, uzahabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Urashaka gukomeza?
communityDeleteContentConfirmation: NTABAZA: Ugiye gusiba imigwi yose muri iki kibano. Ivyo bishobora gutwara umwanya ungana n'umunota, uzohabwa itangazo ryarangiye. Wizeye ko ushaka kubandanya?
communityAnonymizeConfirmation: NTABAZA: Ugiye guhindura imigwi yose ngo ntibimenyekane muri iki kibano. Ivyo bizoba mu misi indwi, bitanga akanya ko abaremye ivyo bintu kubisiba, bazohabwa ubutumwa bwa email. Wizeye ko ushaka kubandanya?
communityDeleteConfirmation: NTABAZA! Nusiba ikibano cose, imigwi yaco, ibiyago n'ingingo z'impaka bizosibwa. Wizeye ko ushaka kubandanya?
groupDeleteConfirmation: NTABAZA! Nusiba umugwi, ibiyago vyawo n'ingingo z'impaka bizosibwa. Wizeye ko ushaka kubandanya?
finalDeleteWarning: NTABAZA YA NYUMA! Wizeye ko ushaka gukora iki gikorwa co gusenya? Uri mu kibanza ciza? Nukibandanya, iki gikorwa ntikizosubirwamwo!
